amendment.description: An amendment No. 12 printed in House Report 114-155 to require a report from the DNI on possibilities for growing national security cooperation between the US, Israel, and India.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 12 printed in House Report 114-155 to require a report from the DNI on possibilities for growing national security cooperation between the US, Israel, and India.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Crowley.
